mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, product_price, product_qty, created_at) values(#{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productQty}, NOW())
mapper.select: select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY product_id ASC) AS row, product_id, product_name, product_price, product_qty, created_at from product
select product_id, product_name, product_price, product_qty, created_at from product WHERE product_id = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{productName}, product_price = #{productPrice}, product_qty = #{productQty}
